name: Queer-o'-nest
description:
Neo Louvre Stories: Queer-o'-nest is a visual novel neoparody about Count Mortalis and his burden. The population of his county is small, but the inability to conceive offsprings forces Count to look for a solution to this problem in the world of Eternal Ruin where everything is a mystery.

Demo uses soundtracks from other games, movies, and composers just for the sake of parody and art. This visual novel is absolutely free and we are not using unoriginal content for profit.

Follow us https://twitter.com/NLUNBLDR on Twitter.

For russian users: https://vk.com/neolouvre
